Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ndifunga ngesibhakabhaka esibambe iinkwenkwezi ezinkulu
NangeMini yesithembiso
NangeMini yokungqina nangeMini1 engqinelwayo
Baqalekisiwe abenza umsele
Womlilo ogalelwe isivuthisi
Behleli ecaleni kwawo (bebukele abo babetshiswa kuwo)
Yaye baye baba ngamangqina oko babekwenza ngokuchasene nabakholwayo
Akukho tyala limbi ababelenzile (abakholwayo) ngaphandle kokukholwa kuAllâh, uSomandla, Ofanelwe ziindumiso zonke
Yena nguMnini bukumkani bamazulu nomhlaba! Yaye uAllâh UliNgqina ngaphezulu kwazo zonke izinto
(Inene abo batshutshisa amakholwa namakholwakazi ngokuwangcungcuthekisa) baze bangaguquki, baza kufumana isohlwayo sesiHogo, yaye baza kufumana isohlwayo soMlilo otshisayo
Inene abo bakholwayo baze benze izenzo zobulungisa, okwabo iya kuba yiMiyezo ekumpompoza amanzi ngaphantsi kwayo. Leyo iya kuba yimpumelelo enkulu
Inene	(wena	Muhammad)	isohlwayo	seNkosi	yakho sibuhlungu kakhulu
Inene	(iNkosi	yakho)	yiYo	Eqalayo,	(ukudala) Yiyo negqibelayo
Yaye Yona nguMxoleli, uSoluthando
UMnini Trone, eZukileyo
NguMenzi wentando yaKhe
Ingaba ibali lemikhosi lifikile na kuwe
(Imikhosi ) kaFir’awn namaThamûd
Yeha abangakholwayo bayaqhubeka nokuphikisa (uMprofeti uMuhammad) nomyalezo wakhe oyi-Islam
Kodwa Yena uAllâh Ubarhangqele ngemva kwabo
Inene le yi’Kur’ân ezukileyo
Ibhalwe eCwecweni elilondoloziweyo
